title: Saying no: a few words to young women about sex
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Assertiveness (Psychology)
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Women - Psychology
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Women's rights
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sex instruction for teenagers
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women's rights
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal relations in adolescence
description: Aimed at adolescent girls this film shows them how to cope with demands made by boys or men for sexual relations when they do not wish to participate. Highlights some standard manipulative responses by males to females when they are denied sex and indicates how girls should go about handling such responses in an assertive manner.
